message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  $115 is the lowest I can go at this time.  Would you be willing to split the difference?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $112.50. Would you consider that?
